Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling along Netherworld Lane, between the Inn and Stables.
Room.LongDescription: The Crimson Dragon Traveller's Lodge is located on the north side of the road, conviniently near the eastern entrance to the city. On the south side of the road are the Highland Stables, where travellers are urged to leave their horses while in town. Head to the east, you can see Netherworld Lane coming to an end when it intersects Highland Avenue.
